name: Mori: Chapter 1
description:
Run n' Gun everything in your path to get fistfuls of cash, then give that money to a snake to make you shoot harder! The desert season is as difficult as it is barren, but there are tons of upgrades and hidden dialogue buried within.

Controller Highly Recommended

macOS version untested

ControlsKeyboardControllerMovewasdL-AnalogJumpSpaceA  / XDashL-ShiftLBShootL-ClickRBAimN/AR-AnalogMeleeE/Q + R-ClickLT + R-Analog⬌ItemGX / SquareSelect ItemArrow KeysD-PadPauseEscapeStartTalk/Interact/BuyFB / CircleUltVRT + R-Analog⬇
